## LoadingProgressIndicatorProps.key property

Unique key representing this loading event.

**Signature:**

```typescript
key: number | string;
```

## Remarks

Each LoadingProgressIndicator instance must have a key prop, which should be set to a unique value for the loading event.

This component is designed with the assumption that each instance is mapped to a single loading event. This allows it to be simpler and avoids a number of potential bugs and edge cases.

See https://reactjs.org/docs/reconciliation.html\#keys
